channel.title: build-pipeline on Douglas Hellinger
channel.description: Recent content in build-pipeline on Douglas Hellinger

item.title: Docs-as-code Build Pipeline Explained: From Crazy to Consistent
item.description: Here’s an example docs-as-code build pipeline. It describes a process for checking and testing documentation written in markdown format. After committing and pushing markdown changes to Github, the pipeline will run.

item.title: How To Create a Docs as Code Build Pipeline
item.description: Before you publish written content, you wanna check spelling, lint markdown, improve prose, and fix broken links. This approach uses a builder image specialised for your docs-as-code workflow.
